pageTitle: Web Extra: Remembering Bobby "Blue" Bland | Chicago Tonight | WTTW
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {23282=Blues singer Bobby Bland died at age 83. A member of the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and recipient of a lifetime achievement Grammy Award, Bland had a memorable performance in WTTW studios back in 1977 on Soundstage. Watch his full solo performance, along with a duet with legendary blues man, B.B. King, in this web extra video.}
